item.title: Using Git with GitHub on Windows
item.description: If you’re new to Git and don’t know how to install Git on Windows, read my earlier post: How to Setup Git for Windows In an earlier post, I described the preliminary steps required to work with git on CodePlex. However using git withGitHub requires more initial steps. Generating SSH Keys. Before proceeding to Git operations we need to create SSH public and private keys, and register the public key on the GitHub site.
